World.pages: in the world of web pages. My performance is mainly with React, Next JS, Tailwind, as well as HTML, CSS and Javascript

DaysNew.challenges: When programming day by day, I look for new challenges that make me able to demonstrate my skills and have work experiences that make me learn new things

Brothers.description-1: Application for a car wash company in the United States, where you can learn about all the services they offer, in addition to making appointments to make your car at another level

BugBookClone.description-2: In this project I learn everything related to Prisma - Postgress. Within it, I highlight my learnings obtained in general and add to the code of the original video, a little of my ideas when programming, creating components, interfaces, etc. The original idea, the profile and the video are in the repository.

Tesla.description-3: Tesla Clone Application, Created from scratch with Next.js and Tailwind CSS in order to demonstrate my skills

Formula.description-4: Application created with React, a mini project that a client requested of me, to be able to calculate some physics and electricity/magnetism formulas

DesignProjects.description-5: Page where I show the projects that helped me understand HTML layout and styling with CSS and SASS, highlighting different techniques and approaches to create attractive and functional interfaces.

TodoApp.description-6: App created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This was my first app.

About-Me.part-1: Hello everyone! I'm Santiago Melo, but you can call me Santi. My passion for programming began about a year ago, right after finishing high school. At that moment I decided to venture into the vast world of programming, and I haven't looked back since.

About-Me-2.part-2: I decided to take charge of my own learning and immerse myself in the world of programming in a self-taught way. I set out to explore a variety of resources, from instructional videos to online course lines and websites specializing in the topic. I am currently studying a degree in Systems Engineering.

About-Me-3.part-3: I am looking forward to facing new challenges and taking advantage of every opportunity to learn and grow. I am sure that great things await me in the future in this exciting world of technology and programming!

Description-Experience-1.description-experience-1: I started in the world of programming after finishing high school. She begins to learn self-taught (Yotube videos, courses on Udemy and more) learning basic HTML, CSS and Javascript and over time expanding to other technologies.

Description-Experience-2.description-experience-2: I worked on my first project being part of a team of 2, being in charge of the entire Frontend side professionally and doing some mini-projects that people asked me for as a student.

Description-Experience-3.description-experience-3: I am showing my work to the world, carrying out mini-projects in a non-professional way, learning new technologies, improving my skills in search of my first job as a web developer, in addition to studying a degree in Systems Engineering.

Description-Experience-4.description-experience-4: I am currently an intern at the company Actosoft, where I am beginning to gain experience professionally and applying my knowledge in real-life projects, developing professionally with Typescript and Material UI components. The repositories are private, however I show proof that they exist. In addition to showing the references of clients who put the website on their social networks.

HOTEL.description-1: Hotel design page with sections for rooms, services and reservations.

NEWS.description-2: Design page for sports with news, results and teams sections

NEXTER.description-3: 'Nexter' hotel design page with rooms and reservations sections

TRILLO.description-4: 'Trillo' hotel design page with sections for photos, services and contact

OUTDOORS.description-5: Página de diseño de naturaleza con secciones para actividades al aire libre

EDGE-LEADER.description-6: Design page cloned from 'Edge Leader' site with focus on leadership with sections for services, team and contact

MyFirstFormDesign.description-7: Design page making my first form

LINETIME.description-8: Design page, where I learned to use animations with style and programming logic
